name: @baublet/redux-tools
description: Reducer factories and selector tools for Redux

scripts.release:major: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release major" && npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release minor" && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && git commit -a -m "Increment and release patch" && npm version patch && npm publish && git push

author: Ryan Poe
